detectors.description:
FastMCTP.getFeeAmounts(FastMCTP.OrderPayload,uint256,address) (FastMCTP.sol#497-512) Sandwich Vulnerability Detected in 'getFeeAmounts' at line [508].
	- Logic: Inequality comparison (<, >) detected.
	- Compares Active Source (Swap/Balance) against User Input ['orderPayload', 'cctpAmount', 'localToken']
